meaningMnemonic: The <radical>thread</radical>s a <radical>criminal</radical> wears will always be <kanji>scarlet</kanji>. Scarlet is the color of freshly spilt blood, which is why bad guys wear it so much.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>scarlet</kanji> color holds a lot of <reading>he</reading>at (ひ). Scarlet is the color of fire, and it has the heat of fire too.
